title: Let Go of That ADC - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Romance   Sci-fi   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Celebrities   College/University   Comedic Undertone   Cute Story   e-Sports   Futuristic Setting   Game Elements   Game Ranking System   Gamers   Glasses-wearing Love Interests   Heartwarming   Honest Protagonist   MMORPG   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Online Romance   Otaku   Polite Protagonist   Popular Love Interests   Power Couple   Programmer   Quiet Characters   R-15   Reporters   Slow Romance   Smart Couple   Strategic Battles   Strategist   Virtual Reality
author: 鲤什么
description:
Because of the fate of a cat, the impoverished writer and sh*t shoveling officer Yue Feng owed a large amount of human debt. The creditor was actually the first ADC in the universe and the legendary e-sports player Q-ONE. 

By accident, Yue Feng changed his career to become an e-sports reporter. He followed the talented e-sports teenagers 24 hours a day all around 360 degrees, without any blind spots, and accidentally became a loyal domestic dog.  

Yue Feng: I’m really a cat guy! !>
